txt.en: In the Dark Delvings, the most forsaken depths of Khazad-d√ªm, the Nameless hold sway over the bitter shadows. Like other creatures that hide in the Black Pit that is Moria, the Nameless dread light, but they will not turn aside from any opportunity to spread corruption and dismay.
Defeated the Gurvand without using the rune-stones

The region of the Dark Delvings is far to the south-east of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nThe dwarf Sigurd has challenged you to make your way into the Dark Delvings and defeat the Gurvand without the help of runes, wishing you to prove your worth as the great warrior you are rumoured to be.
Do not use any of the rune-stones
